<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users/{username}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a paginated list of users.sdsd

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"Page number for pagination","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","default":1}},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","description":"Number of users per page","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","default":20}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of users","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"User","type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier for a user"},"username":{"type":"string","description":"The username of the user"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"Email address of the user"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Time the user was created"}},"required":["id","username","email"]}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
